q: Steve Jobs acknowledged as much in August in a statement on Eric Schmidt 's resignation. He said the decision was mutual and made sense because Eric Schmidt 's effectiveness on the board, which he had served on for three years, will be significantly diminished since he will have to recuse himself from even larger portions of our meetings due to potential conflicts of interest. Google didn't give an explanation for Arthur D. Levinson 's departure, which was effective immediately.
